text: I am just looking for an API to schedule email for future date using dynamic template and send email to list of contacts which already created in our HubSpot account ?

Hey everyone! Is there a log within HubSpot to view cookie responses? For example... someone raises an issue and you have to prove that they opted in to tracking at some point... what is the process to prove their approval?

Hello,

I am using HubSpot x Google sheets integration.
My google sheet contains contact properties, for contacts that already exist in HubSpot (Contact ID, name, email,...)

Is there a way to update my contacts in HubSpot as per the updates done in the google sheet (Using contactID)
So if the contact with contactID 1234567 in google sheet is updated, the contact with contactID 1234567 will be updated accordingly.
